p: The results indicated that the influence of social desirability on Machiavellianism and ethical values was not significant ( r Mach−desirability = 0.117, p = 0.149; r ethics−desirability = 0.083, p = 0.378). Social desirability was also included as a covariate in analysis of covariance (ANCOVA) during statistical analysis, which further excluded its effects on the dependent variable.
